definition: to eat/to consume/to eat at (a cafeteria etc)/to eradicate/to destroy/to absorb/to suffer/to stammer (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [ji2])
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
to wolf down one's food (idiom); to devour ravenously/to gorge oneself
to chew on a large slab (idiom); a large mouthful is hard to chew/to tuck into a great meal
to spoil one's appetite/fig. to get fed up with sth
when hungry, you can't pick what you eat (idiom); beggars can't be choosers/When matters are urgent, don't spend time choosing alternatives.
to gobble up/to gorge oneself on (food)
